Jcg.util

Class DLinkedList<X>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Jcg.util.DLinkedList<X>

  • public class DLinkedList<X>
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Luca Castelli Aleardi (Ecole Polytechnique, 2013) Minimal implementation of a doubly linked list, storing generic type elements
